content:
# Create a frame
dialog = YesNoDialog(dialogName="YesNoCancelDialog", text="Please choose:",
                     command=itemSel)

base.camera.setPos(0, -20, 0)
base.run()

Note

The OkDialog causes an error if being created a second time after destroying it with myOkDialog.destroy(). To solve this you can use:

myOkDialog.cleanup()
